Name: Adventure Light
About the game: Adventure Light is a beautiful and very atmospheric puzzle side-scrolling game about the boy with the magic lantern in the mysterious and dark forest. The main concept around which the major part of the game is built, is the idea of teleportation . There are several basic types of teleportation devices and objects implemented in the game, utilizing which the player is able to solve many interesting puzzles . One of the devices is a magic lantern that the player is carrying around. With its help, the player gets the ability to place a special mark anywhere in the world and teleport back to it at any time later. Features Pocket teleporter: put a mark at a desirable place and teleport back whenever you need. Static two-way teleports: use anomalies such as a wormhole to travel between two places in an instant. Throwable teleport mark: use a special magic gem to get to all the secret places in the mystical forest. Teleport-based puzzles: combine the power of different teleports to solve intricate puzzles. Interactive world: manipulate numerous puzzle elements to unravel the mystery and move forward. Collectible items which will have you peek into the most unexpected hidden areas along your journey. Immersive environment: dark and beautiful atmosphere will help you better immerse yourself in the mysterious world. Dark and mystique music composed by Marcello Colombo, perfectly fits in the game world.
